# [Interview #989: Brandon Sanderson and Harriet McDougal at Microsoft Research, Entry #17](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=989#17)

#### Question

Two questions. Short question first. I was looking through the leaflet. Why is Romanda wanted in Far Madding?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Harriet?

#### Harriet McDougal

I haven't a clue.

[laughter]

#### Question

Good answer.
